news.markdown:
Our Spring Tour 2018 of _May-We-Go-Round?_ and _"It's Okay, I'm Dealing With It."_ has come to an end! You can read a review from our performance in Exeter by clicking the link below: 

**[Review from Dance in Devon](http://danceindevon.org.uk/okay-im-dealing-hiccup-project-dance-review-daisy-harrison/?platform=hootsuite)**



**More exciting news to be announced soon...watch this space!**
